EpubParser

public class EpubParser: PublicationParser

An EPUB container parser that extracts the information from the relevant files and builds a Publication instance out of it.

  • init()

    Undocumented

    Declaration

    Swift

    public class EpubParser: PublicationParser
  • parse(fileAtPath:)

    Parses the EPUB (file/directory) at fileAtPath and generate the corresponding Publication and Container.

    Throws

    EpubParserError.wrongMimeType, EpubParserError.xmlParse, EpubParserError.missingFile
